title: 67 RP Short for Sun Goddess Karma on Snowdown Shop, drew a picture!!
body: Gifted my Fiance the Jinx Christmas skin and was 67 RP short for my Karma skin on the store, here is hoping a Rioter is nice enough to help me out.

replies.body: OH my gosh, I couldn't in good spirit let you have gifted someone and not have enough RP left for your own Your Shop skins!!! Be sure to double check your RP next time you login ^_^
Awesome! Fiance and I couldn't appreciate it more :D
